page.title: 16Employment [1]
page.content: My mom works for Everest Frozen Foods. She goes to work at half past one and gets back about quarter to seven.She goes to work in a van and gets back in a friend's car.She used to work at Bobbington but now there is a new factory in Wombourne.She works on the palets where they check the chips and pack them into boxes to be put on the lorries.My mom also helps with the first aid and she sometimes orders the first aid things. *************************************** My dad owns a newsagents shop in Swindon.We sell stationery,watches, sweets,cigarettes,toys,food and milk. He opens at 6am and closes at 7pm.Every morning he puts up the papers and sorts them out.Later on in the afternoon he goes to the warehouse in Dudley every we to get the things we need for the shop.
